```{r}

dados <- readr::read_rds("pkmn.rds")

pkmn <- params$pokemon

id <- dados |>
  dplyr::filter(pokemon == pkmn) |>
  dplyr::pull(id) |>
  stringr::str_pad(width = 3, side = "left", pad = "0")

imagem <- glue::glue(
  "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/HybridShivam/Pokemon/master/assets/images/{id}.png"
)
```
